Title: The Huaxu Hive: Everything You Need to Know!
Text:
THREAD: Just who on earth IS this "super important guest"?

TurtsStew
Where is that "super important guest" who absorbed Echoes with their bare hands? The Department of Laboratory Evaluation is willing to pay big bucks for their cooperation in our projects...

AzureRiver
Really? with their hands? No way

KingofSlavingoff
No wonder the Magistrate wanted to meet them. How the hell did they achieve that?

TurtsStew
Dude, imagine having them as a research subject. It's gonna set us up for years! Please someone anyone if you've got their contacts share them

LILI
They're rumored to be showing up at Huaxu Academy today

1Encounter1
Today??? But I'm out on a field trip! Damn...

PearlyOrchard
Yall gotta treat our guest with respect. Stop acting like a bunch of wackos

TurtsStew
Sure, I'll be very polite so this precious test subject willingly join our projects

LILI
You sound alarmingly creepy turts

Galestorm_
anyone remember the Tacet Discord attack from over a century ago? Some Elite Classes actually made it into the city. The then-general swooped in with his army and got rid of them. We didn’t know how to deal with leftover Reverberations back then, it almost caused a mini Waveworn Phenomenon…
And then apparently, a person with dark hair and golden eyes showed up out of nowhere to absorb all that excess energy with their bare hands. Saved the day and then disappeared without a trace.

KingofSlavingoff
That sounds familiar

Galestorm_
Our guest must be some big person then, to be able to pull of something similar

TurtsStew
Ok now I must get into contact with this person, guys if you have their number or something dm me
